channel.title: Hacker News Podcast
channel.googleplay:author: Poulad Ashrafpour
channel.description: Hacker News articles of the day transformed to podcasts via speech synthesis.

item.title: Why do Android phones mysteriously exchange 260MB a month with Google via cellular data?
item.description: Ad giant sued after mobile allowances eaten by hidden transfers. Read full article at https://www.theregister.com/2020/11/14/google_android_data_allowance/.
